resources.string: I am Aasritha Bhimisetty currently persueing my masters in Computer Science at Pace University. I interested in coding so I choose computer science as an major. I completed my bachelors in Computer Science in India. The skills that I had learned from my under grad are programming skills in C, C++, java HTML etc.. Basically I had done fewer projetcs in my under grad and trying do more in Pace University. And I also have certifications in AIandML, cloud computing, big data.
My Hobbies are playing online games and listening to music
